description: Number of 3-antichain covers of a labeled n-set.
references: V. Jovovic and G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6)
V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On enumeration of the class of all monotone Boolean functions, in preparation.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Antichain covers
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (22,-190,820,-1849,2038,-840).
example: There are 2 3-antichain covers of a labeled 3-set: {{1},{2},{3}}, {{1,2},{1,3},{2,3}}.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Jul 25 2000
